Package uno

Class UnoGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • uno.UnoGame

  • public class UnoGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all game logic for the UNO game.
    Author:
    Derek Syrba, John Frocillo, and Adrian Harrell

      • playCard

        public void playCard​(uno.Player player,
                     uno.UnoCards playedCard)
        Method that handles the logic for playing a card from a players hand into the discard pile.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player object that is playing the card.
        playedCard - - the UnoCards object being played from the player's hand.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid​(uno.UnoCards currentCard,
                       uno.UnoCards top)
        Method that checks if a card being played is a valid move.
        Parameters:
        currentCard - - the player's card that is being played.
        top - - the top card of the discard pile to compare the played card to.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the move is valid.

      • nextCard

        public void nextCard​(uno.Player player,
                     uno.UnoCards currentCard,
                     boolean isNext)
        Method that handles the logic of looking through different cards in the player's deck.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player object who's hand is being looked at.
        currentCard - - the current card being looked at by the player.
        isNext - - a boolean value that indicates whether the player is moving to the card to the right or left of their current card (true for right, false for left).

      • createDeck

        public java.util.ArrayList<uno.UnoCards> createDeck​()
        Method that creates all of the UnoCards objects for all 108 cards in a standard uno deck, placing them into an arraylist and shuffling it.
        Returns:
        deck - the arraylist that holds all of the uno cards.

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck​(java.util.ArrayList<uno.UnoCards> deck)
        Method that shuffles the arraylist that holds the uno cards.
        Parameters:
        deck - - the arraylist that holds the UnoCards objects, resembling the deck.

      • dealDeck

        public void dealDeck​()
        Method that handles the logic for dealing the initial 7 cards, that start in each player's hand.

      • reshuffle

        public void reshuffle​()
        Method that handles the logic for reshuffling the deck when. it runs out of cards, so players can continue drawing cards

      • aiMove

        public boolean aiMove​(uno.Player player)
        Method that that makes the current computer play a card from their hand
        Parameters:
        player - - the player corresponding to which computers turn it is
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the computer makes a play, false if the computer draws a card
